txt.en:
On any hit deals 4% of the damage dealt to you back to the attacker.<rgb=#00FFDD>On any hit, 
 applies the 'Chilled' effect to the attacker.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>On any hit, 
 applies the 'Fell Fire' effect to the sorceress.</rgb>
Balefire and the Gelid wind combine to defend you. Those foolish enough to strike you while protected by both the Gelid Wind and Balefire are punished.
